content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello! Thank you for inviting me to see the apartment. I would like to negotiate the rental price with you. What is your initial offer for the apartment?
name: Max Müller

content: My initial offer is 500 Euros per month. This is the highest I can go. I want to maximize my profits. What is your counter offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your offer. I am open to negotiating, but I am looking for a lower rental price. My counter offer would be 400 Euros per month. Is this a possibility for you?
name: Max Müller

content:
I see. 400 Euros is too low for me. My offer of 500 Euros is final. I am not willing to negotiate any lower.

If you agree to this price, I will sign the lease agreement and move in right away. If not, I will continue my search for another apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your response. I understand that 500 Euros is your final offer. If we cannot reach an agreement on the rental price, I will need to look for another apartment. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Max Müller
